name: Huntred
description:
We would like to present you a small detective story. We hope you’ll find this project interesting. 

Alert!

It is only the Alfa version, more like an art showcase, it is in development, sorry but we need any feedback, to make the final game as good as it is possible!

P.S.: We don't want to spoil anything about the story, so you will be free to explore it by yourself. :)

If you would like to check updates you may visit our discord server. (https://discord.gg/PXtWSbpaaY)

Also, we have a Patreon page, we will add some additional content for patrons with development(Huntred | Patreon).
